title: Marianna Ikhmalian
subtitle: Analog Photography
name: Name
errorValidEmail: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
messageThankyou: Thank you for your message! I will get in contact with you soon.
aboutParagraphOne: I was born and live in Moscow. I have been working in analogue photography since 2015. In 2019 I graduated from the Moscow Architectural Institute.
aboutParagraphTwo: My usual camera is the small-format Pentax K1000. I print my pictures with the analogue silver-gelatine process. This technique makes every print unique.
aboutParagraphThree: I rely on the works of photographers Sally Mann and Diana Arbus. What is common in their photos becomes something special and frightening. People start playing someone else's role, becoming actors.
aboutParagraphFour: Support me: Purchase author's prints from the "Still Life" series!
credentials: I will contact you via the messenger service Telegram or WhatsApp.
